greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 - n^2.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: E.g.f.: (1 - x - x^2)*exp(x). - _G. C. Greubel_, May 11 2017
program: (MAGMA) [1-n^2: n in [0..50]]  /* or */  I:=[1,0,-3]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 3*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..50]];
results.author: _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 12 2015
